title: Medications Under Investigation for BPD
itunes:title: Medications Under Investigation for BPD
description:
What other medications can we offer to our patients with BPD? This episode discusses some novel medication approaches used in borderline personality disorder, including omega-3 fatty acids, methylphenidate, clonidine, doxazosin, memantine, and oxytocin. 

Faculty: Paul Links, M.D. 
Host: Jessica Diaz, M.D.

  • Learn more about our memberships here
  • Earn 0.5 CMEs: Pharmacologic Management of BPD: Recent Developments
  • Omega-3 Fatty Acids, Methylphenidate, Clonidine, Doxazosin, Memantine, and Oxytocin for BPD
